title: Development Engineering Scholar Woojin Jung Finds Significant Discrepancies in Global Poverty Measures
author: Tamara Straus
excerpt: Woojin Jung, an assistant professor in the Rutgers School of Social Work, credits her interdisciplinary education in social welfare, public policy, and development engineering for her award-winning research.
